title: Looking for Flex Players Silver 3+
body:
Hi I am very keen on getting a bunch of people together to play organised 5's with. 
I'm looking for people that are willing to play and grow as a team. (aka not tilt and trash talk the game or their teammates).
Im NZ based and am on most nights after work :)

Add Jellytots if you are interested 
oh and I adc main so looking for a support to do duos with too!
